card.name: Academy Beastmaster Stats
card.property: Stir the Beast Once per round, when the Beastmaster summons a Level 1 animal creature, he may pay 1 mana to have it enter play active instead of inactive.

card.name: Academy Druid Stats
card.property: Herbalist Once per round, when you cast a potion, you may pay 1 mana to place 1 additional Charge token on it.

card.name: Academy Elementalist Stats
card.property: Elemental Glyphs When the Elementalist casts a spell he is trained in, he may activate the Glyph that matches the school on that spell. These Glyphs may be deactivated to grant a benefit to the Elementalist.

card.name: Academy Forcemaster Stats
card.property: Power Transfer Once per round, when your Mage or a friendly force creature declares an attack, you may pay 1 mana and remove a Dissipate token from a force creature you control. If you do, the attacking creature gains Melee +2 for this attack.

card.name: Academy Monk Stats
card.property: Ki You begin the game with 2 Ki. During the Upkeep Phase, you gain 1 Ki. Ki may be spent to augment specific spells and abilities.

card.name: Academy Necromancer Stats
card.property: Curse of Undeath Once per round, when an enemy Living creature is destroyed, you may remove up to 2 damage from a mummy creature you control.

card.name: Academy Priestess Stats
card.property: Blessing of Champions Whenever the Priestess casts or reveals a healing or protection spell she may place a guard marker on a friendly Holy creature in her zone by paying mana equal to its level.

card.name: Academy Warlock Stats
card.property: Sacrifice of Blood Once per round, when a friendly demon creature attacks, during the Roll Dice Step of that attack, the Warlock may place 1 point of direct damage on that demon to re-roll all of the attack dice (but not the effect die).

card.name: Academy Warlord Stats
card.property: Battle Orders Once per round, as a quick command spell, you may pay 3 mana. If you do, friendly soldier creatures gain Melee +1 until the end of the round. If you control a revealed formation, reduce the cost of this ability by 1.

card.name: Academy Wizard Stats
card.property: Extend Magic When you reveal an enchantment with the Dissipate X trait, you may pay mana equal to that spell's Level, to place 1 additional Dissipate token on it.

card.name: Amulet of Attunement
card.property: Once per round, when you have Priority, you may deactivate one Glyph to gain 2 mana.

card.name: Asyran Robes
card.property: This Mage gains Aegis 1. Each Upkeep Phase, you may move 1 damage from a friendly Living creature in this zone to this Mage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "When your sword is stopped by a piece of cloth, you know it is Divine." — Magus Jara

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The precision of a single dart cannot be underestimated; and neither can the poisons they deliver." — Yosef, Merchant of Many Things

card.name: Bo Staff
card.property: Mage gains a Defense. This Defense can only be used when Melee attacked, and if you pay 2 Ki. If this Mage is level 5 or higher, Bo Staff rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Burning Cuirass
card.property: This Mage gains Armor +1. The first time this Mage is melee attacked each round, his attacker receives 1 point of direct flame damage during the Counterstrike Step of the Attack.

card.name: Cleansing Potion
card.property: When Cleansing Potion enters play, place 3 Charge tokens on it. Once per round, when you have Priority, you may remove a Charge token from Cleansing Potion. If you do, remove a poison condition from a friendly creature in this zone by paying the removal cost. Cleansing Potion cannot be replaced. When there are no Charge tokens remaining on Cleansing Potion, destroy it.

card.name: Cloak of Fire
card.property: Whenever you are melee attacked, during the Counterstrike Step of that attack, roll the effect die: On a roll of 7+, place a Burn condition marker on the attacker if they do not already have one.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "No elementals were harmed in the making of this cloak." — Yoseph, Merchant of Many Things

card.name: Commander's Cape
card.property: Once per round, you may pay 1 less mana when you cast or reveal a command spell or cast a soldier creature spell.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Half of being able to give orders is looking the part." — Magus Xer, Professor of Aesthetic Magery

card.name: Corrosive Concoction
card.property: When Corrosive Concoction enters play, place 3 Charge tokens on it. Once per round, when you damage an enemy creature with a non-spell attack, you may remove a Charge token from Corrosive Concoction to place a Corrode condition on that creature. Corrosive Concoction cannot be replaced. When there are no Charge tokens remaining on Corrosive Concoction, destroy it.

card.name: Dampening Cloak
card.property: This Mage gains the Aegis 1 trait while being attacked by a Ranged attack.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The dye is infused with angels' blood; the fabric woven with runes of protection." — Yoseph, Merchant of Many Things

card.name: Demonhide Mask
card.property: This mage gains the Demon subtype while attacking. This Mage's attacks gain the Piercing +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Demonic artifacts are not always made of metal. Some are forged with flesh and spirit, and bound with rage and malice.

card.name: Devout Robes
card.property: This Mage gains Armor +1. Once per round, as a quick spell, you may pay X Ki to remove a condition on this Mage. X = the condition's removal cost.

card.name: Dragon's Lance
card.property: Dragon's Bite Quick | Melee | 3d6 | d12 7+ = Burn
When you declare a Dragon's Bite attack, you may spend 1 Ki. If you do, gain +6 to the effect roll. If this Mage is level 5 or higher, Dragon's Lance rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Dragon's Mantle
card.property: This Mage gains Armor +1. Once per round, when this Mage is melee attacked and damaged, you may pay 2 mana or deactivate your Fire Glyph. If you do, place a Burn condition on the attacker.

card.name: Elemental Staff
card.property: Mage gains a Defense. This defense can only be used when you are Melee attacked, you pay 1 mana, and you deactivate one of your Glyphs. If this Mage is level 5 or greater, Elemental Staff rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Emerald Elk Stave
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, you may heal up to 2 different animal creatures in your zone 1 damage each, by paying 1 mana per creature healed.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Great Galador, let your spirit provide vitality and strenth to protect us." - Straywood Prayer

card.name: Eye of Bael
card.property: The first time each round a friendly demon creature attacks and damages an enemy creature, you gain 1 mana from Eye of Bael, then your Mage receives 1 direct damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The final trial was a pact with Bael himself. His eye watches me always." — Devris Valda

card.name: Faith Healer's Staff
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, you may pay 1 mana to heal a Living creature in this zone the amount rolled on 1 attack die. If this Mage is level 5 or greater, the Righteous Strike attack rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Force Armor
card.property: This Mage gains Armor +1. Attacks targting this Mage gain the Piercing -2 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You mean it always fits, regardless of how many cakes you may or may not have eaten?" — Mirth

card.name: Gladius
card.property: If this Mage is Level 5 or greater, Gladius rolls an additional attack die.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The gladius delivers powerful thrusts in close combate, making in the weapon of choice for the Ivarium soldier.

card.name: Golden Shield
card.property: This Mage gains a Defense which can only be used against ranged attacks. When Golden Shield successfully avoids an attack, place "1" damage counters on it, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Magic is great, but a shield is simpler." — Magus Bellarax

card.name: Headdress of Stasis
card.property: Once per round, when a non-Epic Mind spell you control with the Dissipate X trait has its last Dissipate token removed, you may pay mana equal to its Level - 1 to destroy it at the end of the round instead.

card.name: Hellstar
card.property: Flaming Spiked Ball Quick | Melee | 3d6 | d12 8+ = Burn
If this Mage is Level 5 or greater, Hellstar rolls an additional attack die.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "In the Seventh Trial, I was given a chunk of pure hellstone from which to craft a weapon." — Devris Valda

card.name: Illusory Leggings
card.property: This Mage gains the Elusive trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Psyoculus-spun silks are both rare and coveted outside of Dsjer-Tet. Their weave magnifies ambient magic and dulls the sense of those nearby.

card.name: Ivarium Halberd
card.property: This Mage gains the effects of friendly formation spells and Battle Orders as if it had the soldier subtype. If your Mage is level 5 or higher, Ivarium Halberd rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Jeweled Scarab
card.property: When a creature your Mage controls is destroyed, your Mage may either heal 1 damage or gain 1 mana.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Crafted in the Temple of Souls by the priests of Abenek, the Jeweled Scarab captures the spirits of the fallen to bolster the power of the wearer.

card.name: Johktari Hunting Knife
card.property: When you attack and deal damage with this weapon, a friendly animal creature in your zone may gains Melee +1 until the end of the round. If your Mage is level 5 or higher, Ivarium Halberd rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Kajarah
card.property: If a friendly animal creature attacked and damaged the target this round, this attack gains 1 attack die.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Jhoktari weapons have a way of finding their way back home.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Warriors notch their belts with fallen foes. We pitfighters prefer to notch our belts with runes of protection. We find it far more useful." — Agrippa, Master Swordsman

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Everyone's got to wear pants. Might as well be something functional." - Erx, Dean of Sartorial Studies

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Dromachia armor is all about function. If it keeps you alive, who cares if it's scratched or faded?" — Paldrus, Dromachi Pit Keeper

card.name: Living Armor
card.property: When Living Armor is cast, place 2 Armor +1 tokens on it. When you are attacked and damaged, remove an Armor +1 token from Living Armor. During the Upkeep Phase, you may pay 1 mana for Living Armor to gain 2 Armor +1 tokens, to a maximum of 3.

card.name: Packleader's Cowl
card.property: Once per round during this Mage's activation, he may choose a minor friendly animal creature in his zone, pay mana equal to their level, and place a Guard marker on that creature.

card.name: Rage Tonic
card.property: When Rage Tonic enter play, place 3 Charge token on it. Once per round, when you have Priority, you may remove a Charge token from Rage Tonic. If you do, target friendly Living creature in your zone gains Melee +1 until the end of the round. Rage Tonic cannot be replaced. When there are no Charge tokens remaining on Rage Tonic, destroy it.

card.name: Ramses' Black Death
card.property: When Ramses' Black Death enters play, place 2 Charge tokens on it. Once per round, as a quick spell action, you may remove a Charge token from it. If you do, all other Living creatures in this zone receive 1 direct damage, then heal yourself 1 damage for each creature that received damage. When there are no Charge tokens remaining on Ramses' Black Death, destory it.

card.name: Repulsion Cloak
card.property: When this Mage is melee attacked, the attacker must pay 1 mana, or the attack is canceled. Has no effect on counterstrikes.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The cloak projects a field that keeps enemies away. However, with a little mana one can slip right through.

card.name: Resplendent Bow
card.property: Arrow of Light Full | Ranged 0-1 | Light | 2d6 | Piercing +1

If Resplendent Bow attacks another friendly Living creature, instead of dealing damage, you may heal them the amount rolled on 2 attack dice. If this Mage is Level 5 or greater, the Arrow of Light attack rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Ring of Ki
card.property: When Channeling, you may pay 1 mana. If you do, gain 2 addtional Ki.

card.name: Rod of the Arcanum
card.property: When this attack damages an enemy Non-Mage creature, that creature's controller loses 1 mana (if he has any to lose). If this Mage is level 5 or higher, Rod of the Arcanum rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Scepter of Undeath
card.property: Once per round, when a minor undead creature in your zone activates, you may pay 2 mana. If you do, that creature rolls 2 additional attack dice on their next attack this round. If that creature is a mummy, reduce the cost of this ability by 1 mana.

card.name: Shifratar
card.property: Once per round, when you delcare a non-counterstrike attack with Shifratar, you may pay 3 mana. If you do, Shifratar's Slash gains the Sweeping trait for that attack. If Shifratar is destroyed, place it back into its owner's spellbook. If this Mage is Level 5 or greater, Shifratar rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Sistarran Robes
card.property: This Mage gains Armor +1. Once per round, when an opponent pays or loses mana because of an effect you control, you gain 1 mana.

card.name: Soulreaper
card.property: When you cast Soulreaper, your Mage receives 3 direct damage. When declaring a Maim attack, this Mage receives 2 direct damage. If this Mage is level 5 or higher, Soulreaper rolls an additional attack die.

card.name: Strategist's Helm
card.property: When you have Priority, your Mage may use their Battle Orders ability as a free action (paying its mana cost normally).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Listen closely, Turathor. A Warlord's true power lies in his ability to command his troops, not in the swing of his sword." — Magus Bellorax

card.name: Symbiotic Orb
card.property: Once per round, when a friendly object in your zone is melee attacked, you may pay 3 mana or remove a Dissipate token from a force creature you control. If you do, the defender avoids the attack. This counts as a Defense.

card.name: Tempered Faulds
card.property: This Mage gains Armor +1. Once per round, when this Mage is the target of an attack with an effect roll, you may force the attacker to reroll the effect die.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Don't get your faulds in a wad." — Dromachi taunt

card.name: Unholy Armor
card.property: Reduce the mana cost of Unholy Armor by the number of Corporeal creatures you control. When you cast Unholy Armor, all Corporeal creatures you control receive 1 direct damage. This Mage gains Armor +2.

card.name: Wand of Ice and Fire
card.property: Once per round, as a quick spell, you may pay 2 mana to place a Burn or Freeze condition on a target Corporeal object up to 1 zone away.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: It molds two primal elements together, leaving their power at your fingertips.

card.name: Wispwillow Amulet
card.property: Whenever you remove a Dissipate token from Wispwillow Amulet, gain 1 mana.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Lasts only as long as the wisp trapped inside, but I'll give you great deal on it!" - Yoseph, Merchant of Many Things

card.name: Wychwood Ironvine
card.property: This Mage gains Armor +1 and the Regenerate 1 trait.

card.name: Alluring Orchid
card.property: If an enemy minor creature in this zone declares a non-counterstrike attack, it must target Alluring Orchid. When Alluring Orchid is melee attacked, during the Counterstrike Step, place a Rot condition on the attacker.

card.name: Dense Fog
card.property: Creatures in this zone gain the Onscured trait. Creatures may ignore guards when making melee attacks against conjurations in this zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "It's pretty tough to kill what you can't see."

card.name: Freeze Weapon
card.property: Increase Freeze Weapon's cost by 2 if the target equipment is level 2. This equipment is Disabled (it loses all attack bars, action bars, and non-trait abilities) and cannot be replaced. Flame attacks against Freeze Weapon roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Healing Tree
card.property: Once per round, when you have Priority, Healing Tree may heal another friendly living object, in this zone, for 2 points of damage. Flame attacks against Healing Tree roll 2 additional dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Wounds mend under its canopy.

card.name: Hellscape
card.property: Flame attacks against objects in this zone roll an extra die. At the beginning of the Upkeep Phase, place a Burn condition on all creatures and conjurations in this zone that do not already have a Burn condition. Hydro attacks against Hellscape roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Ice Spikes
card.property: When a non-frost creature in this zone activates, it receives 2 points of direct frost damage. Flame attacks against Ice Spikes roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Mana Lotus
card.property: When the last dissipate token is removied from Mana Lotus, its controller gains 5 mana. Flame attacks against Mana Lotus roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Mana Shard
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, 1 object with channeling in this zone may gain 1 mana.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Even tiny shards of mana will resonate with each other and provide skilled mages with power.

card.name: Meredia's Shrine
card.property: As a quick action, friendly living creatures in this zone may pray; heal 2 damage from that creature or remove a condition from that creature with a removal cost of 2 or less.

card.name: Thunderstorm
card.property: Lightning Strike Ranged | Lightning | 3d6 | d12 5+ = Stagger | Ethereal
When a Dissipate token is removed from Thunderstorm, it makes the attack above, targeting a creature in its zone.

card.name: Volcano
card.property: Eruption Zone Attack 0-0 | Ranged | Flame | 4d6 | d12 7+ = Burn | Unavoidable
When the last Dissipate counter is removed from Volcano, it make the attack above before it is destroyed. Hydro attacks against the Volcano roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Acid Ooze
card.property: Engulfing Rust Quick | Melee | Acid | 2d6 | d12 3+ = Corrode
Acid Ooze ignores all non-critical damage from attacks. Direct damage and attack effects occur normally.

card.name: Afflicted Demon
card.property: When Afflicted Demon is summoned, place 2 Weak condition markers on him. Whenever he attacks and damages a Living creature, he may move a Weak condition marker from himself to that creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Watch the tail!" - First Marine Officer Phillippe Wynn

card.name: Atticaran Porcupine
card.property: Quill Attack Quick | Melee | 1d6 | Piercing +1, Counterstrike
While making a counterstrike, Atticaran Porcupine gains Melee +2.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I heard Mirth got suspended for casting one just as his instructor sat down in his chair." - Academy Gossip

card.name: Aurora Lucere, Dawnbreaker's Chosen
card.property: Aurora Lucere treats minor creatures as Pests, and gains the Aegis 2 trait when attacked by a minor creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Stand as an equal in the sight of the Dawnbreaker, a shield against the forces of Darkness." — Brogan Bloodstone

card.name: Azurean Genie
card.property: When Azurean Genie is summoned, place 3 Wish tokens on him. As a Quick action, remove 1 Wish token and target a Living creature in his zone. The target gains Melee +2 this round, or Heals 2 damage, or gains the Stagger condition.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Once he tended fields, but now he brings in a darker harvest.

card.name: Broken Wing Angel
card.property: When Broken Wing Angel is summoned, you may heal a Living creature in her zone the amount rolled on 3 attack dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: To make themselves whole, they must first heal others.

card.name: Combustion Demon
card.property: When Combustion Demon is summoned, you must target a Corporeal creature in its zone that does not have a Burn condition on it; place a Burn condition on that creature.

card.name: Corpsebloom
card.property: After making a Biting Blooms attack, place a Stagger condition on Corpsebloom. Flame attacks against Corpsebloom roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Darkfenne Asp
card.property: Poisonous Bite Quick | Melee | 1d6 | d12 7+ = Weak

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "It survives in a land dominated by giant monsters. Caution is appropriate." - Mikal Mckay, Beastmaster

card.name: Darkfenne Owl
card.property: Creatures in this zone cannot be healed. (this includes healing from the Regenerate X trait)

card.name: Darkfenne Rat
card.property: If there is another friendly rat in this zone, Darkfenne Rat's attack gains the Piercing +2 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Its teeth are sharp, but its hunting method is what makes it truly dangerous. It calls out to its fellows, and then, when the moment is right, it gives the signal for all to attack en masse." — Magus Norbel

card.name: Diamond Golem
card.property: Diamond Fists Quick | Melee | 2d6 | Critical Damage
When Defending, during the Damage and Effects step, prevent 3 damage from that attack.

card.name: Disciple of Radiance
card.property: Once per round, whenever your Mage casts or reveals a healing spell, Disciple of Radiance may deal 1 direct light damage to a target creature in her zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Light brings forth light.

card.name: Drakas, Imp Overlord
card.property: All other friendly demons in Drakas' zone gain Melee +1. During the Upkeep Phase another friendly demon creature in this zone must receive 1 direct damage, if able.

card.name: Ehren, Enduring Paladin

property.name: Attack
property.value: {'name':'Sword of the Last Watch','action type':'Quick','range type':'Melee','range':[0,0],'dice':1}

card.property: Sword of the Last Watch Quick | Melee | 1d6
When summoned, place 7 damage on Ehren. The first time he has 0 damage, place 4 Melee +1 tokens on him.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: His path to glory is paved with tribulation.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The Bellicari are a sect of elves which has embraced a more militaristic philosophy and has settled in Ivarium. They often serve as military advisors and make up a large portion of the Ivarium Legions.

card.name: Eye of Itadjet
card.property: Psionic Blast Quick | Ranged 0-0 | Psychic | 2d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Ethereal, Unavoidable, Critical Damage

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Like many of the psyoculi that inhabit the Haunted Deserts, the Eye of Itadjet burrows into the sides of sand drifts waiting for unsuspecting travelers to venture near.

card.name: Firefist Brawler
card.property: If the Flaming Fists attack rolls any critical damage, place a Burn condition on the defender.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Demons aren't much different from other evil beings. Some are devious. Other just want to hit things." — Magus Pyr

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Khenet-Tay mentally projected a cat-like creature with long, tapered ears. "This is a desert caracal, a favorite of Akum-Re's priests."

card.name: Force Golem
card.property: When Force Golem attacks and damages a creature, it may remove one of its Dissipate tokens to place a Stagger condition on that creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Force Gremlins are little more than a mental outline of mischievousness.

card.name: Force Phoenix
card.property: Aegis 2 • Nonliving • Dissipate 5 Forcemaster Only • Unique
When Force Phoenix is destroyed, target friendly force creature gains 2 dissipate tokens. When Force Phoenix is destroyed, you may pay 7 mana to Reanimate it.

card.name: Frost Elemental
card.property: Frozen Fists Quick | Melee | Frost | 5d6 | d12 7+ = 2 Freeze

card.name: Galgommon
card.property: Jolt Quick | Melee | Lightning | 2d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Ethereal
Legendary • Lightning Immunity • Psychic Immunity Incorporeal • Nonliving
During the Upkeep Phase, destroy Galgommon unless you pay 1 mana.

card.name: Gloranna, Avenging Angel
card.property: Holy Water Sprinkler Full Action | Melee | 1d6 | Sweeping
Holy Water Sprinkler rolls an additional attack die for each Holy creature in your discard pile, to a maximum of 4 Holy Creatures.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The fallen have hallowed this ground; let us honor them with righteous fury." - Gloranna

card.name: Goblin Legionnaire
card.property: When summoned, you may pay 4 mana. If you do, immediately summon a Goblin Legionnaire from your spellbook, into the same zone, as a free action. A maximum of two additional friendly Goblin Legionnaires can be summoned this way, each round.

card.name: Gorgon Spearthrower
card.property: Poison Spear Quick | Ranged 0-1 | 3d6 | d12 8+ = Weak

card.name: Harshforge Construct
card.property: When Harshforge Construct would attack an object, after the attack dice are rolled, you may choose to destroy a revealed, non-Epic enchantment attached to that object with a total mana cost (casting plus reveal cost) equal to or less than the total rolled on the attack dice, instead of dealing damage.

card.name: Harshforge Knight
card.property: Harshforge Knight cannot be targeted by enchantments or incantations.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Much of the harshforge iron stolen by the Arraxian Crown ended up reforged in Ivarium.

card.name: Haruku, Shadowy Assassin
card.property: Haruku cannot be targeted while active. While attacking an inactive creature, Backstab gains the Piercing +2 trait.

card.name: Hellfire Ants
card.property: Hellfire Ants can attack different targets with their additional strikes.

card.name: Hired Bodyguard
card.property: When this creature is summoned, place a guard marker on him.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You get who you pay for."

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Falconry is an ancient and noble pursuit, with a storied tradition among the Johktari.

card.name: Ice Golem
card.property: Frosty Fists Quick | Melee | Frost | 3d6 | d12 +2 = Freeze
Melting 1 • Nonliving • Frost Immunity Psychic Immunity • Flame +2

card.name: Izimbila, Daughter of Badgers
card.property: If your Mage is trained in Nature magic, Izimbila gains the animal subtype. If your Mage is trained in War magic, Izimbila gains the soldier subtype.

card.name: Jade Gremlin
card.property: When Jade Gremlin is melee attacked, as a Defense, you may pay 1 mana to have it avoid the attack.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You have to be quick! They teleport so fast its impossible to catch these pests!" - Magus Bellarax

card.name: Jungle Defender
card.property: When Jungle Defender attacks a Flying creature, it rolls 2 additional attack dice. Flame attacks against Jungle Defender roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Kelsar Ranger
card.property: Kelsar Ranger's Shortbow attack gains the Piercing +1 trait while there is a friendly guarding creature in her zone.

card.name: Khali-Gar, Blade Maiden
card.property: Cascade of Blades Quick | Melee | 4d6 | Counterstrike
Khali-Gar's Defense only works against melee attacks.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Infernian legend holds that Abaddon created Khali-gar for Bael, forging her from the souls of other blade demons.

card.name: Kharne, Horned Demon
card.property: Kharne gains Melee +1 for each enemy creature in his zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Kharne feeds on the souls of those around him, drawing power from their fear.

card.name: Killer Bees
card.property: 1000 Stings Quick | Melee | Poison | 1d6 | Critical Damage

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "They look cute individually, but then you hear the loud hum of 2000 tiny wings behind you." - Coshade

card.name: Kraven, Werewolf Slave
card.property: When Kraven attacks a damaged Livig creature, he rolls 2 additonal attack dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Cruelly tricked by the once noble Goran, Kraven was enslaved by the Warlock Savinius Moltentongue.

card.name: Lashing Liana
card.property: When a friendly plant creature is this zone is damaged by a melee attack, Lashing Liana deals 2 direct damage to the attacker. Flame attacks against Lashing Liana roll 2 additional dice.

card.name: Lightning Raptor
card.property: Electric Bite Quick | Melee | Lightning | Xd6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Ethereal

During the Upkeep Phase, Lightning Raptor gains a Charge token, to a maximum of 5 tokens. X = the number of Charge tokens on him. If Lightning Raptor has 5 charge tokens, its attack gains the Counterstrike trait.

card.name: Lowland Unicorn
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, you may heal a Living creature in this zone 1 damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You can tell if a place is civilized by whether they ride their unicorns or cook them up." — Arhnoot, Blood Wave Warlord

card.name: Magma Sprite
card.property: Searing Tailwhip Quick | Melee | 1d6 | d12 7+ = Burn
Frost attacks against the Magma Sprite roll 2 additional dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Spirits of flame can shape magma into a whimsical form.

card.name: Mana Worm
card.property: When Mana Worm attacks and damages a creature, that creature's controller loses 1 mana (if he has any to lose).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: It hails from the plane of Voltari, a place of arcane energies. Just be glad it's still a grub.

card.name: Matatoomba, Plagued Spirit
card.property: Plaguetouch Quick | Melee | 3d6 | Ethereal, Critical Damage
Minor creatures cannot declare attacks targeting Matatoomba. Creatures with Psychic Immunity ignore this effect.

card.name: Matesis, the Fallen Pharoah
card.property: When a melee attack is declared targeting Matesis while he is guarding, you may change the target of the attack to another friendly mummy in this zone. This does not cause Matesis to lose his guard marker.

card.name: Meditating Monk
card.property: As a Full Action, Meditating Monk may meditate: You gain 1 mana.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Our meditation puts us in harmony with a state of natural energy, the inner depths of being." - Sem Ki

card.name: Mhegedden, Sealed Demon
card.property: When summoned, place 3 Seal tokens on Mhegedden. During the Upkeep Phase, move 1 Seal token onto your Mage. Each Seal token on your Mage gives him Life -2. While Mhegedden has Seal tokens, he gains the Pest trait, and may not take any actions.

card.name: Mud Golem
card.property: As a full action, if Mud Golem has less than 3 Charge counters, it may place a Charge counter on itself. For each Charge counter, increase its Life by 2 and it gains Melee +1.

card.name: Mummified Swordmaster
card.property: While Mummified Swordmaster is damaged, it may spend a Full Action to make a Twin Blades attack with the Doublestrike trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I'll take a deal with a vampire over a deal with a demon anytime. A few bites here and there, and you're fast friends. No need to sell your soul or sacrifice someone." — Dane, Renegade Warlock

card.name: Oboko, Sohei Master
card.property: As a full action, Oboko may meditate: you gain 2 Ki.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "A battle is won in the mind before it can be won with the body." — Oboko, Sohei Master

card.name: Paralyzing Basilisk
card.property: Paralyzing Ray Full Action | Ranged 0-1 | 2d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: A basilisk's gaze will stop a warrior dead in their tracks.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The lynx is a Pellian symbol of fearlessness. It is a popular symbol, adorning the shields and banners of noble houses.

card.name: Plagued Voidwalker
card.property: Plague Strike Quick | Melee | 3d6 | d12 9+ = Rot
While Plagued Voidwalker is damaged, Plague Strike gains +4 to its effect roll.

card.name: Priest of Abenek
card.property: As a full action, Priest of Abenek may place 1 direct damage on a living creature in this zone. If he does, remove 1 damage from a friendly mummy in this zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "To fall before a minion of Itadjet, the Asp-headed god of war, is a fitting humiliation for you." — Khenet-Tay

card.name: Psionic Scarab
card.property: When Psionic Scarab successfully attacks an object, it may remove one of its Dissipate tokens, before damage is dealt, to make all damage from that attack critical.

card.name: Pygmy Titanodon
card.property: When Pygmy Titanodon is summoned, place a Charge token on it. Pygmy Titanodon rolls 3 additional attack dice while it has a Charge token. Remove the Charge token after making an attack.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "He stalks from the shadow's edge, only appearing to those who are worthy of the Talon of the Jungle." - Dajekto, Kumanjaro Shaman

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Wonder what Bloodwave orcs and goblins eat? Often it's the very thing that seeks to eat them first.

card.name: Redcrested Cockatrice
card.property: Poisonous Bite Quick | Melee | 2d6 | d12 7+ = Weak
When Cockatrice makes a counterstrike, he gains Melee +1, and his Poisonous Bite attack gains Piercing +1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Don't underestimate the torture they can inflict.

card.name: Ridgeback Skunk
card.property: When a Living creature melee attacks Ridgeback Skunk, place a Stagger condition on that creature during the Counterstrike Step of that attack.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Want to know the best way to scatter orcish troops?" - Gork

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Spirits of stone are deliberate and durable.

card.name: Royal Armorer
card.property: As a Quick Action, Royal Armorer may pay 1 mana to place an Armor +1 token on a soldier, knight, or angel creature in his zone which does not already have one.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: It may have less heads than its cousin, but I assure you two are more than enough!

card.name: Sanguine Hunter
card.property: When Sanguine Hunter is summoned, place 2 direct damage on a friendly creature in his zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The easiest demons to summon are often the most treacherous.

card.name: Satyr Gruff
card.property: When Satyr Gruff attacks and deals 4 or more damage to an enemy creture, place a Stagger condition on that creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Don't carry a mace if you won't swing it." - Satyr Saying

card.name: Servant of Malacoda
card.property: Whenever Servant of Malacoda is melee attacked, he deals 2 direct poison damage to his attacker.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Their presence is just as unbearable as their master's.

card.name: Silverclaw Ratel
card.property: While he has damage on him, Silverclaw Ratel's Claws attack gains Doublestrike. Silverclaw Ratel cannot guard.

card.name: Slavorg, Fang of the First Moon
card.property: Slavorg costs 2 less mana for each animal creature in your discard pile. At the end of each of his activations, you may pay 2 mana to place a Guard marker on him.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Their path to enlightenment begins with mastery of skill.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Even the mightiest grizzly starts out as a cub.

card.name: Steelclaw Matriarch
card.property: Steelclaw Matriarch gains Melee +1 for each friendly Steelclaw Cub in her zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Now you've done it. I told you to say away from her cubs!"

card.name: Straywood Scout
card.property: Once per round, as a full action, Straywood Scout may target an enemy creature. Friendly creatures gain +1 attack die for the next attack they make against the target creature, this round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: It is the will of the marshlands given form.

card.name: Swamp Serpent
card.property: Venomous Bite Quick | Melee | 2d6 | d12 8+ = Rot

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Its fangs drip with the poison of the swamp.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Its thick shell can turn aside the sharpest swords.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Known to take down a nest of vipers with wild abandon and walk away with nary a scratch.

card.name: Temple Sentry
card.property: Temple Sentry gains Armor +2 while guarding. When Temple Sentry is summoned, place a guard marker on him.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "My faith will keep me steadfast, and this evil shall not pass."

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Those aspiring to join the ranks of the Royal Archers have their skills honed at the Holy Temples until called upon by the Grand Court of Westlock.

card.name: The Embalmed
card.property: When summoning The Embalmed, remove a non-Epic Living creature in any discard pile from the game. This creature becomes a copy of the removed creature, gaining The Embalmed's traits and subtypes. X = the removed creature's mana cost.

card.name: Tide Elemental
card.property: Tidal Crash Quick | Melee | Hydro | 4d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Extinguish
Hydro Immunity • Nonliving • Resilient Burnproof • Frost +2
As Quick Action the Tide Elemental can remove all Burn conditions from one object in this zone.

card.name: Tjusut, the Risen King
card.property: When Tjusut is summoned, place a Guard marker on him. While Tjusut has a Guard marker, he cannot reset.

card.name: Tomb Guardian
card.property: Once per round, when you have Priority, you may remove a Dissipate token from Tomb Guardian. If you do, place a Guard marker on Tomb Guardian.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: A Dromachi favorite, Torgo hails from the icy lands of Friest, far to the north of Ivarium. Few Dromachi have a reputation for being as tough, or as unforgiving.

card.name: Vengeful Merchant
card.property: Deathtouch Quick | Melee | 1d6 | Ethereal, Critical Damage
When declaring a Deathtouch attack, you may place 2 damage on your Mage to gain the Melee +2 trait for that attack.

card.name: Vengeful Voidwalker
card.property: While Vengeful Voidwalker is damaged, its Claws attack rolls 1 addtional die.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Many times the size of normal frogs, many fear its gapping maw.

card.name: White Cloak Knight
card.property: White Cloak Knight is immune to the damage and effects of attack spells.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You shall be my sword; I shall be your shield." — The Dawnbreaker

card.name: Wychwood Faerie
card.property: Once per round, if Wychwood Faerie is in your zone, you may pay 1 less mana if you cast an enchantment or an animal creature spell.

card.name: Wychwood Hound
card.property: While Wychwood Hound is in the same zone as one or more other friendly Wychwood Hounds, it gains Armor +1 and the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Fierce pack hunters, they gain strength in numbers."

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: While the Ivarium Legions are deployed to protect the nation, Elven Rangers patrol the wilds of the northwest.

card.name: Wychwood Rat
card.property: While another friendly rat is in this zone, Wychwood Rat gains the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Beware the Wychwood Rat," lectured Magus Norbel. "If you see one, hundreds more are undoubtedly nearby. In a swarm, they can bring down a hydra."

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Xiro guards the Dsjer-Tet Pharaoh in life, and death.

card.name: Akiro's Game
card.property: When you reveal Akiro's Game, gain 2 mana. During the Upkeep Phase, place a Stagger condition on the creature with the highest casting cost in this zone. If there is a tie, roll the effect die to determine which creature is Staggered.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Akiro will prolong a conflict to keep the battle going.

card.name: Arcane Ward
card.property: When this object is the target of an incantation or enchantment spell, you must reveal Arcane Ward. That spell is countered (canceled without effect). Any mana spent to cast the spell is refunded to the caster. Then, destroy Arcane Ward.

card.name: Arcane Webbing
card.property: You can only reveal Arcane Webbing when you have Priority. Corporeal creatures in this zone roll 1 less attack die when making non-spell attacks (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Asyra's Grace
card.property: Creatures in this zone cannot receive damage. This spell cannot be destroyed, except bu its Dissipate effect. You may only reveal Asyra's Grace during the Upkeep Phase.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Shield us by your Light"

card.name: Asyra's Touch
card.property: This creature gains Aegis 1. If this creature is Level 1, you may reduce the reveal cost of Asyra's Touch by 1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Your faith in Asyra is than any armor." - Magus Jara, Professor of Theology and Holy Magic

card.name: Badger Frenzy
card.property: The next time this creature makes a quick melee attack, that attack gains the Doublestrike trait. At the end of that attack, destroy Badger Frenzy. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Badger Frenzy by 1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Some of the wood elves are more animal than elf, and use this spell to double their savageness!"

card.name: Blessed Focus
card.property: While this creature has no damage, it gains the Melee +1 trait and Piercing +1 on its attacks.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Otherworldly power can only be contained in a pure vessel.

card.name: Chakra of Protection
card.property: While you control the fewest creatures, Melee attacks roll 1 less attack die against this Mage (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Circle of Protection
card.property: All friendly Living creatures in this zone gain Armor +1. During the Upkeep Phase, you may heal 1 damage from a Living Holy creature in this zone.

card.name: Cowardice
card.property: Cowards may only be revealed when this creature is activated. This creature cannot make a melee attack against a creature of a greater level.

card.name: Curse Item
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, destroy this equipment, unless its controller chooses to receive 2 direct damage. This equipment cannot be replaced.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Twisting living essence is easy. True masters can subvert the very steel in their enemy's hand.

card.name: Curse of Decay
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, this creature receives 1 direct damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Best never to sleep in Magus Nergol's classes. You wake to find you've got a nasty case of rotting flesh." - Mirth

card.name: Curse of Servitude
card.property: When this creature activates, its controller must either place 2 damage on it, or attack a friendly creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Pain controls a mind easier than psychic probing.

card.name: Curse of Weakness
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, the controller of this spell may pay 2 mana. If they do, place a Weak condition on this creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "This curse fills their veins with poison and saps their strength. Remember it well." — Saldam Kurr, Necromancer Magister

card.name: Deep Freeze
card.property: This object loses and cannot gain the Melting X trait. Additionally, Freeze conditions are not removed at the end of this creature's activation. Flame attack against this object roll 2 less dice.

card.name: Defend Me
card.property: You can only reveal Defend Me when an enemy creature activates. This creature gains a guard marker, then destroy Defend Me. If this is a minor creature, reduce the reveal cost of Defend Me by 1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Your aggression ends with me."

card.name: Demonic Link
card.property: This demon creature gains the Melee +1 trait. The first time each round that this demon creature attacks and damages a Living enemy creature, its controlling Mage may heal 1 damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "There are... other paths to healing. Paths that do not require pious supplication." — Magus Pyr

card.name: Desperate Focus
card.property: While this Mage controls fewer creatures than any other Mage in the Arena, this Mage gains Armor +1 and Melee +1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I have seen Beyond. Those who harness the power of the Mind need no allies. They have themselves, a force more powerful than any army." — Domatra

card.name: Dig In
card.property: Friendly soldier creatures in this zone gain the Armor +1 trait. At the end of a friendly soldier creature's activation in this zone, they may pay 2 mana. If they do place a guard marker on that creature. If this ability is used by a minor creature, reduce the cost of this ability by 1.

card.name: Divine Reversal
card.property: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Divine Reversal. You may prevent up to 2 damage from that attack. After the attack, heal this creature 2 damage. Then, destroy Divine Reversal.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Asyra, transform my pain that I may triumph!"

card.name: Dodge
card.property: Dodge counts as a Defense and must be revealed when this creature is attacked. If this creature is a minor creature the attack is avoided. Otherwise, roll a d12: On a roll of 7+ the attack is avoided. Then destroy Dodge.

card.name: Drop Item
card.property: Drop Item can only target equipment in the weapon and/or shield location. You can only reveal Drop Item when you have Priority. This equipment is Disabled (it loses all attack bars, action bars, and non-trait abilities). As a quick action, the controller of this equipment may destroy Drop Item. If this equipment is level 2, increase the reveal cost of Drop Item by 2.

card.name: Exile
card.property: When this creature activates you may reveal Exile and teleport this creature outside the arena (remove it from the play area with this enchantment attached). When this enchantment is destroyed, this creature returns to the same zone it came from. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Exile by 1.

card.name: Fire at Will
card.property: Non-Spell ranged attacks made by friendly friendly creatures in this zone gain the Piercing +2 trait. When a friendly soldier creature in this zone declares a non-spell ranged attack, they may pay 2 mana. If they do, that attack gains the Unavoidable trait. If this ability is used by a minor creature, reduce the cost of this ability by 1.

card.name: Force Shield
card.property: This Mage gains the Aegis X while defending against a Melee attack. X equals the number of Dissipate token on Force Shield.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You dare raise a weapon against me? What chance do you have when even thoughts can block your blade?" — Khenet-Tay

card.name: Form Ranks
card.property: When a friendly soldier creature in this zone is attacked and receives damage, you may transfer 1 of that damage to another friendly soldier creature in this zone instead. When a friendly minor soldier creature in this zone would be melee attacked, they may pay 2 mana. If they do, that attack rolls 2 less attack dice (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Fortified Resolve
card.property: Once per round, when this Mage attacks and damages an enemy creature, place a Charge token on Fortified Resolve, you may remove a charge token from Fortified Resolve to reduce the damage from that attack by 2.

card.name: Frost Trap
card.property: When this creature activates, you must reveal Frost Trap. Place 2 Freeze conditions on this creature. Then, destroy Frost Trap.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The only thing Grak hated more than mages was ice — and ice mages.

card.name: Galvanize
card.property: You can only reveal Galvanize if this creature has a condition marker. Remove one condition marker from this creature by paying its removal cost, and this creature gains Melee +1.

card.name: Gator Toughness
card.property: This creature gains Armor +1 and Life +2.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "As tough as a gator, and only half as cranky." — Feive, Student of Laddinfance

card.name: Giant Size
card.property: This creature gains Life +5 and Melee +2.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Size may not matter, but it's certainly fun!

card.name: Glancing Blow
card.property: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Glancing Blow at the beginning of the Roll Dice step. If you do, that attack rolls 3 less attack dice (minimum 1 die). Then, destroy Glancing Blow.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "When you falter, you give hope. When you give hope, victory slips away." — Magus Bellarax

card.name: Hoodwink
card.property: When this object is the target of an enemy controlled spell or attack, you may reveal Hoodwink: Gain 3 mana and then destroy Hoodwink. If Hoodwink is destroyed, even if hidden, you may place it back into your spellbook.

card.name: Iguana Regrowth
card.property: This creature gains Life +2 and the Regenerate 1 trait. X = this creature's Level.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Nature mages are one with the regenerative power of reptiles." — Magus Norrell

card.name: Joined Strength
card.property: This creature gains Melee +1. Whenever it is attacked and receives damage you must transfer 1 of that damage to your Mage instead. If this creature is destroyed you may pay 1 mana to move Joined Strenth to a new target in your zone.

card.name: Lesser Invisibility
card.property: You can only reveal Lesser Invisibility when you have Priority. This creature gains the Invisible trait. Destroy Lesser Invisibility after this creature makes an attack. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Lesser Invisibility by 1.

card.name: Martial Mastery
card.property: While you control the fewest creatures, your melee attacks and attack spells in which you are trained roll an additional attack die. Once per round, when you cast or reveal a martial spell, reduce its mana cost by 1. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed.

card.name: Mass Cowardice
card.property: Mass Cowardice can only be revealed when an enemy creature is activated. Living creatures in this zone cannot make melee attacks against creatures of a higher level.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Teach the ignorant to fear you," Domatra said quietly. "Twist their machinations against them — it is simple to do."

card.name: Mind Seize
card.property: When this creature activates, you must reveal Mind Seize. This creature must make a non-spell attack of your choosing against a legal target of your choosing, in this zone. Then, end its activation and destroy Mind Seize. X = taret's Level + 2.

card.name: Minor Essence Drain
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, this creature's controller must pay 1 mana, or the creature is destroyed.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Make your opponents pay for every success they find." - Mordok

card.name: Miss
card.property: When this creature declares a non-spell attack, you must reveal Miss. The attack fails and is canceled. Then, destroy Miss.

card.name: Overgrowth
card.property: This creature gains Life +2 and Melee +1 traits. If this creature is a plant, reduce the reveal cost of Overgrowth by 1.

card.name: Paladin's Valor
card.property: This creature gains Armor +2. While attacking a creature of greater Level, it gains Melee +2.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "May the power of the Dawnbreaker course through your veins." — Cassius Lionheart

card.name: Panther Stealth
card.property: This creature gains the Elusive triat. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Panther Stealth by 1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The panther is patient, and you must embrace this patience when you stalk your prey."

card.name: Press the Attack
card.property: Friendly soldier creatures in this zone gain Melee +1. When a friendly soldier creature in this zone makes a melee attack, during the Roll Dice Step of that attack, they may pay 2 mana. If they do, you may re-roll all of the attack dice (but not the effect die). If this ability is used by a minor creature, reduce the cost of this ability by 1.

card.name: Promotion
card.property: You can only reveal Promotion when this creature attacks and damages an enemy creature. This creature gains Armor +1 and Melee +1. If this creaure is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Promotion by 1.

card.name: Reclamation
card.property: Each Upkeep Phase, this Conjuration receives 2 direct damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Meredia reclaims what you have taken from her!"

card.name: Redirect
card.property: Redirect counts as a Defense and must be revealed when this creature is attacked. That attack is avoided. The attacker receives 2 direct damage. Then, destroy Redirect.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You have such a high opinion of your spells - enjoy them yourself!" — Joleen

card.name: Redistributed Power
card.property: As an additional cost to reveal Redistributed Power, you must remove two Dissipate tokens from force creatures you control. This creature gains Melee +2. If this spell would be destroyed by an opponent's effect, prevent that destruction, unless that opponent pays 3 mana.

card.name: Reprisal
card.property: This creature's quick action melee attack gain the Counterstrike trait. The first time this creture makes a counterstrike attack, destroy Reprisal.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Beasts understand the way of the world: once bitten, bite back." — Devris

card.name: Repulsion Field
card.property: When this creature is melee attacked, you must reveal Repulsion Field. Cancel the attack and place a Stagger condition on the attacker, then destroy Repulsion Field.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Come no closer to me!"

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "So long as you carry the will to fight, She will provide the means." — Jolleen

card.name: Sanctuary
card.property: This creature is teleported outside the arena. When Sanctuary is destroyed, return the creature to play in the zone it was last in. You cannot reveal Sanctuary during an action or activation. If this is a minor creature, reduce the reveal cost of Sanctuary by 1.

card.name: Sanguine Thirst
card.property: This creature's melee attacks gain the Vampiric trait. If this creature is level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Sanguine Thirst by 1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Since abandoning the Arraxian Crown, I've learned the hard way every grim trick of the dark arts. I've come to terms with most of it, save for the trast of angel blood." — Dane, Renegade Warlock

card.name: Second Chance
card.property: When this creature is destroyed you may reveal Second Chance. You may immediately summon this creature into the zone it was destroyed in as a free action. X = the creature's casting cost.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The Temple Sentry stood again, wounds healed, face a mask of resolve.

card.name: Shock
card.property: When this creature is melee attacked, during the Counterstrike Step of the attack, you may reveal Shock. Place a Stagger condition on the attacker. Then, destroy Shock.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Ever wonder what it's like to grab hold of a thunderstorm?

card.name: Shrink
card.property: This creature gains the Pest trait. When it attacks, it rolls 2 fewer attack dice (to a minimum of 1). X = the creature's Level.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Leopards make such cute kitties." - Reyleth, Student of the Arcane

card.name: Slumber
card.property: You may reveal Slumber when this creature is activated. This creature is sleeping. It cannot guard, take actions, or use Defenses. Whenever this creature is attacked and damaged, remove a Dissipate token. X = this creature's Level.

card.name: Stench of Death
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, all creatures in this zone receive 1 direct poison damage.

card.name: Tangleroot
card.property: This creature's melee attacks roll 1 less attack die (to a minimum of 1) for each Dissipate token on Tangleroot.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The enchantment causes swift and spontaneous plant growth tangling those unfortunate to be nearby.

card.name: Tar Trap
card.property: You must reveal Tar Trap when this creature activates. This creature is Restrained and gains the Flame +1 trait. Uncontainable creatures are immune to Tar Trap.

card.name: Telekinetic Bomb
card.property: When Telekinetic Bomb is destroyed after it has been revealed, it makes the above attack against the target.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You will create something then is neither light nor fire. It will burn with the power of your inner might." — Magus Erozar

card.name: Terrifying Visage
card.property: Melee attacks from creatures of a lower Level roll 2 less attack dice against this creature (to a minimum of 1). This does not affect creatures with the Nonliving or Psychic Immunity traits. X = this creature's Level -1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "What you see is your own inner demon. Embrace it and despair." — Archeon Valda

card.name: Theft of Life
card.property: The first time this creature is healed or regenerates each round, prevent 1 point of healing. Then heal your Mage 1 damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "This spell is a leech, feeding off the rejuvenating energies of your enemies." — Tellas Vane

card.name: Unholy Reversal
card.property: You must reveal Unholy Reversal when damage on this creature would be healed. Prevent up to 3 point of healing, then deal 3 direct damage to this creature. Then, destroy Unholy Reversal.

card.name: Wolf Fury
card.property: This creature gains the Melee +1, and its melee attacks gain Piercing +1. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Wolf Fury by 1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The wolf has strength and cunning. You embody both." - Rajan, Lord of Beasts

card.name: Abyssal Sacrifice
card.property: Destroy the Target Creature. If you do, target a different friendly Dark creature in that zone, place a Melee +1 marker on it, and remove damage from it equal to the level of the destroyed creature.

card.name: Bound Healing
card.property: Target non-Mage Living creature heals the amount rolled on 2 attack dice. Heal the caster of this spell the amount rolled on 2 attack dice.

card.name: Crumble
card.property: Gain 2 mana. Destroy target equipment. X = the casting cost of target equipment.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Magic comes from the Realm of Voltari. Through a careful harnessing of its essence, all things can be made or unmade." — Magus Festendenti

card.name: Cure
card.property: Remove one condition marker on target creature by paying its removal cost. If you do, heal that creature the amount rolled on 2 attack dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Asyra shelters, the Dawnbreaker bolsters, and Bim-Shalla heals.

card.name: Disperse
card.property: Destroy target enchantment. X = the reveal cost of target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Just as they are woven together, any enchantment can be torn apart." — Thessial, Faculty of the Arcanum

card.name: Distraction
card.property: Remove all Guard markers from creatures in the target zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: One thought out of place... and disorder sets in.

card.name: Extinguish
card.property: Remove a Burn condition from the target. Then, you may remove any number of additional Burn conditions by paying the removal cost for each.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I'll take soggy robes over charred armor any day." — Fieve

card.name: Fizzle
card.property: Target revealed enchanment is turned face down, and its controller loses mana equal to its level. It cannot be revealed this round. X = the reveal cost of the enchantment.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Nothing is more frustrating than having to repeat yourself." — Laddinfance

card.name: Focused Strike
card.property: The target's next non-spell attack this round rolls an additional attack die, gains the Piercing +1 trait, and the Unavoidable trait. If the target is a minor creature, reduce the mana cost of Focused Strike by 1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Scholars in Westlock study history. Scholars in Ivarium study advantage." — General Flavius

card.name: Gear Up
card.property: Only a Mage cast this spell. As free actions, cast up to three Equipment spells from you spellbook, targeting your Mage, paying the total mana cost for each one.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "One thing's for sure. Dwarves know a thing or three about armor." — Magus Dargum

card.name: Group Mend
card.property: Heal each friendly Living creature in this zone the amount rolled on 2 attack dice. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Bathe in the light my brethren, for we are champions!

card.name: Meditation
card.property: Only a Mage can cast this spell. Gain 3 Ki.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Discipline begins in one's own mind.

card.name: Mend
card.property: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The very breath of Bim-Shalla reinvigorates her followers.

card.name: Neutralizing Mist
card.property: Remove any number of Corrode conditions from the target, paying the removal cost for each.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: This simple mist can cleanse some of the harshest acid.

card.name: Rapid Dismantle
card.property: Choose up to 2 level 1 equipment objects attached to target Mage and destroy them.

card.name: Remove Curse
card.property: Destroy as many revealed curse enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal) for each one. Then if you destroyed at least 1 curse enchantment, you gain 2 mana.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Curses have no place in the Light of Asyra.

card.name: Reveal Magic
card.property: Peek at target hidden enchanment. Once Reveal Magic has been cast, the enchantment cannot be revealed this round. If it is a mandatory enchantment, then it is not destroyed if it would be forced to be revealed this round.

card.name: Ritual of Kallek
card.property: You lose 2 life, then gain 3 mana. You can only cast this spell once per round.

card.name: Siphon Energy
card.property: Remove a Dissipate token from the target. If you do, heal 2 damage from your Mage. Siphon Energy cannot remove the last Dissipate token from an object.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Life and death, vitality and entropy... these are one to students of the mind."

card.name: Siphon Life
card.property: Only a Mage may cast this spell. Roll 3 attack dice. Target Living creature receives that much direct damage. The caster may heal up to the amount of damage dealt.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "There are paths that we do not speak of openly outside these halls. Paths to undeath, for example." — Magus Nergol

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.property: Target gains the Elusive trait and its melee attacks gain the Piercing +2 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Nothing can look everywhere all the time." — Goblin Proverb

card.name: Soul Harvest
card.property: Destroy target creature and heal damage from your Mage equal to twice its level. X = target creature's mana cost plus the combined total mana costs of enchantments on that creature (hidden enchantments cost 2 mana).

card.name: Sweeping Strike
card.property: Once this round, if this creature uses a full action to make a quick action melee attack, that attack gains the Sweeping trait. Reduce Sweeping Strike's mana cost by 1 when targeting a minor creature.

card.name: Unholy Blood Ritual
card.property: Your Mage receives 1 direct damage for each friendly demon creature in play. While attacking this round, friendly demon creatures gain the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Blood is the conduit. Pain becomes power.

card.name: Upheaval
card.property: If the target is level 1 and non-Epic, destroy it. X = the Conjuration's mana cost + the combined mana costs of any objects attached to it. (Hidden enchantments are mana cost 2.)

card.name: Acid Blast
card.property: Ranged | Acid | 2d6 | d12 9+ = Corrode | Sweeping, Unavoidable
When this attack Assigns Effects place an additional Corrode condition on the defender.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: No protection is sufficient when covered in acid.

card.name: Arcane Missiles
card.property: You may make this attack against up to 3 different targets in the same zone. Damage from this attack is critical (ignores armor). Roll for each attack separately.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Frost is a relentless element — cold, sharp, and unfeeling.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Winter covers all in solid sheets of ice.

card.name: Dazzle
card.property: Ranged | Light | 1d6 | d12 4+ = Stagger | Ethereal, Unavoidable
When attacking a Nonliving creature, roll 2 extra attack dice and add 2 to your effect roll.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Wickedness and corruption are no match for the Light of Asyra.

card.name: Dragon-Tail Sweep
card.property: When this attack is declared, you may pay 2 Ki. If you do, this attacks rolls 1 additional attack die.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "In fire, we find our strengths. Fire burns. Fire rages. Fire stays until its subject is fully consumed. Find yourself in fire." — Magus Pyr

card.name: Fist of Iron
card.property: When this attack is declared, you may pay 3 Ki. If you do, this attack deals Critical Damage. Fist of Iron cannot gain the effect of the Melee +X trait.

card.name: Fist of Lightning
card.property: If this attack is successful, you may pay X Ki. If you do, the non-Mage defender becomes inactive. X = level of the defender plus 1.

card.name: Force Daggers
card.property: You may make this attack against up to 3 different targets in the same zone. Roll for each attack separately.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I have a few thoughts on the subject of domination. Let me demonstrate." — Khenet-Tay

card.name: Forked Lightning
card.property: Ranged | Lightning | 3d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Sweeping, Ethereal
This attack has the Sweeping trait, and can be used against two different targets.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Why hit one fool when you can split the difference?" - Ursbay the Astute

card.name: Flying Side Kick
card.property: When this attack is declared, you may pay 2 Ki. If you do, this attack rolls 2 additional attack dice.

card.name: Gale Burst
card.property: If a minor creature is damaged by Gale Burst, it becomes inactive. Gale Burst rolls 2 additional dice versus Flying creatures.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Professor Dargum uses it to wake up anyone cheeky enough to sleep in his class." - Academy Gossip

card.name: Piercing Thunderstrike
card.property: Ranged | Lightning | 4d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Ethereal, Piercing +2

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Laddinfance harnessed the accuracy of a speeding arrow with the power of a thunderstorm. The result was excruciating.

card.name: Projected Leg Sweep
card.property: If this attack is successful, you may pay 2 Ki. If you do, gain a +6 to the effect roll.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Martial skill meets mental force.

card.name: Projected Palm
card.property: When this attack is declared, you may pay 2 Ki. If you do, this attack gains the Unavoidable trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: When Mages need to make a little space.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Feive thought practicing some expansive elemental magic in the caverns under the Cloister of Wonders was a good idea — at least until his spells roused the brood of Mana Worms that were nesting in the ceiling.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Some vines produce fruit; this one yields only pain.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Dromachi gladiators are an inventive lot, turning even the ground around them in weapons.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I see you brought steel," Khenet-Tay snarled in her strange, lilting accent. "A pity for you; I chose to bring my Mind."

card.name: Telekinetic Burst
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | 3d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Ethereal, Unavoidable
Attack all objects in this zone except the caster.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Mind magic starts small, a tiny ripple in the ocean of your deep consciousness. To be an adept, you must learn to become one with the ripple, feeding it power as it grows outward." — Magus Erozar

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Imagine my delight, when I realized that I could torment all my foes at once." — Zhul the Black

card.name: Twister
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Wind | 3d6 | Ethereal, Unavoidable
If a minor creature is damaged by Twister, it becomes inactive. Twister rolls 2 additional dice versus Flying creatures.

card.name: Volley of Flame

property.name: bAttack
property.value: {'name':'Volley of Flame','Spell':True,'source type':'Attack','Cost':6,'range type':'Ranged','range':[0,0],'Zone Attack':True,'damage type':'Flame','dice':3,'effects':{6: ['Burn']}}

card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Flame | 3d6 | d12 6+ = Burn
All creatures and conjurations in the target zone receive the above attack. Choose and roll for each 1 at a time.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Victory at the expense of your allies is victory no less. Total destruction means just that." — Magus Bellarax

card.name: Voltaic Discharge
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Lightning | 3d6 | d12 7+ = Stagger | Ethereal

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I got an 'A' for showmanship, and an 'F' for control." - Feive, Student of Laddinfance
